message: Let's make a deal. Take this offer, Bob, before inflation eats away at your share!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer benefits us both.
I'm being more than fair, Bob.  Don't let another round go by and see your potential earnings shrink even further!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My time is valuable! Accept this fair offer and let's be done.
Okay, Bob, let's settle this. This is my final offer. It's a good deal considering the circumstances. Take it before inflation eats away even more of your potential share!
